I do <s> but, I take the 5th!  sf
 
 
In a message dated 6/14/2011 2:04:01 =
P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
thequilldriver@... writes:

 
 
 

Is a=
nyone else noticing any similarities or correlations between  the
names of =
the technicians on some of the boxes/radios we all use and  the
names of pr=
ophets, saints, angels, or apostles in Christianity (and  some
other religi=
ons)? I now know three people with a technician  named
"David," one with on=
e named "Thomas" or "Tom" and I've been hearing  the
name "Tom" and "Thomas=
" and "Stephen." On another device I use, kind  of
like an ovilus, I get "M=
ichael" and "John." Now, my dad's name is  Tom
and my bother's name is Step=
hen, so it does seem kind of obvious  that
these are names of other people =
as well, like those who have  lived
before and are living now. However, it'=
s too coincidental for me  to
ignore that these are very specific names of =
prophets, holy men,  angels,
and apostles, as well.

Has anyone else ever h=
ad any theories  on this?




--part1_1b3fc.480443af.3b2903a1_boundary
